questions.text: What was Alphabet's total revenue for the year ended December 31, 2023?
questions.explanation: According to the income statement, Alphabet's total revenue for 2023 was $307,394 million.

questions.text: What was the year-over-year revenue growth rate from 2022 to 2023?
questions.explanation: Revenue growth rate = (2023 revenue - 2022 revenue) / 2022 revenue = (282,474 - 265,696) / 265,696 = 6%

questions.text: What was Alphabet's gross profit margin for 2023?
questions.explanation: Gross profit margin = (Total revenues - Cost of revenues) / Total revenues = (282,474 - 126,203) / 282,474 = 55%
